name: Ronald Ralph Ponton
description: There are somethings you can’t explain, somethings you don’t want to see and there will be things you just can’t handle. I’m none of those things. I’ve found that finding the ONE has become a daunting task. Easy going, love jokes and good conversation. I have a great sense of humor and I bet if you are ever lucky enough to meet me I can make you laugh so hard you’d forget your name.
